description.label: Description
description.value: You channel manic green ribbons of Warp energy that you send tearing at a single target’s flesh. The targeted creature is struck by a magic missile with a Damage of +5. Also, the ruinous ribbons follow your target wherever it goes until the spell ends. At the end of every Round, including this Round, the target gains +1 Bleeding Condition.

lore.label: Lore
lore.effect: Warp Sorcerers gain a +10 bonus to Channelling and Language (Magick) Tests in any underground environment, such as a cavern, sewer or even a basement. Targets who suï¬€er Wounds from Warp Lore spells must pass an Average (+20) Endurance Test to avoid contracting a Minor Infection.
